radiographic_examinations.findings: Severe increase in hematocrit (Hct), hemoglobin (Hb), and red blood cell (RBC) count.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Seven months after the last testosterone undecanoate injection and 3 months after phlebotomy, Hb and Hct decreased but remained above the normal range.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Severe increases in Hct, Hb, and RBCs were observed at multiple time points.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: 4 and 7 months after starting the therapy, good glycemic control and weight loss were achieved, but the severe increases in Hct, Hb, and RBCs remained.
